mapper.insert: insert into t_poi (id, lat, lng, price, overall_rating, taste_rating, service_rating, environment_rating, image_num, comment_num, uid, name, address, tag, detail_url, type, shop_hours, atmosphere, featured_service, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lat,jdbcType=REAL}, #{lng,jdbcType=REAL}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{overallRating,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tasteRating,jdbcType=REAL}, #{serviceRating,jdbcType=REAL}, #{environmentRating,jdbcType=REAL}, #{imageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{detailUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shopHours,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{atmosphere,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{featuredService,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_poi set lat = #{lat,jdbcType=REAL}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=REAL}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, overall_rating = #{overallRating,jdbcType=REAL}, taste_rating = #{tasteRating,jdbcType=REAL}, service_rating = #{serviceRating,jdbcType=REAL}, environment_rating = #{environmentRating,jdbcType=REAL}, image_num = #{imageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, detail_url = #{detailUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, shop_hours = #{shopHours,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, atmosphere = #{atmosphere,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, featured_service = #{featuredService,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, lat, lng, price, overall_rating, taste_rating, service_rating, environment_rating, image_num, comment_num, uid, name, address, tag, detail_url, type, shop_hours, atmosphere, featured_service, description from t_poi where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, lat, lng, price, overall_rating, taste_rating, service_rating, environment_rating, image_num, comment_num, uid, name, address, tag, detail_url, type, shop_hours, atmosphere, featured_service, description from t_poi
